original_text: And further, by these, my son, be admonished: of making many books there is no end; and much study is a weariness of the flesh.
korean_text: 내 아들아 또 이것들로부터 경계를 받으라 많은 책들을 짓는 것은 끝이 없고 많이 공부하는 것은 몸을 피곤하게 하느니라

sentences.original_text: And further, by these, my son, be admonished:
sentences.korean_translation: 더욱이, 내 아들아, 이것들로 훈계를 받으라:

sentences.original_text: of making many books there is no end;
sentences.korean_translation: 많은 책을 만드는 것은 끝이 없고;

sentences.original_text: and much study is a weariness of the flesh.
